00059 #ifndef LINEBREAK_UTF_TYPES_DEFINED
00060 #define LINEBREAK_UTF_TYPES_DEFINED
00061 typedef unsigned char   utf8_t;         
00062 typedef unsigned short  utf16_t;        
00063 typedef unsigned int    utf32_t;        
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #define LINEBREAK_MUSTBREAK             0       
00067 #define LINEBREAK_ALLOWBREAK    1       
00068 #define LINEBREAK_NOBREAK               2       
00069 #define LINEBREAK_INSIDEACHAR   3
